For us, our local community, our clients, and our country this has been a week of the unexpected.  A week of changes that we would have never seen coming one month ago.  As we come to the start of another week together, we want to spread a message of encouragment.  Each day, we will continue to take one more step forward, towards a new day, new week, and eventually a new month on the other side of this pandemic.  Until then, we are with you.  We are here to help, spread happiness, and to continue to support our client and vendor families alike ‚ù§Ô∏è This too shall pass üì∏ @amysmith_photo
